name: R5-QuestionnaireItemOperator-R4-QuestionnaireItemOperator
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 QuestionnaireItemOperator into FHIR R4

element.display: True if no answer has a value that is equal to the enableWhen answer.

target.display: True if whether at least no answer has a value that is equal to the enableWhen answer.

element.display: True if at least one answer has a value that is less than the enableWhen answer.

target.display: True if whether at least no answer has a value that is less than the enableWhen answer.

element.display: True if at least one answer has a value that is less or equal to the enableWhen answer.

target.display: True if whether at least no answer has a value that is less or equal to the enableWhen answer.

element.display: True if at least one answer has a value that is equal to the enableWhen answer.

target.display: True if whether at least one answer has a value that is equal to the enableWhen answer.

element.display: True if at least one answer has a value that is greater than the enableWhen answer.

target.display: True if whether at least no answer has a value that is greater than the enableWhen answer.

element.display: True if at least one answer has a value that is greater or equal to the enableWhen answer.

target.display: True if whether at least no answer has a value that is greater or equal to the enableWhen answer.

element.display: True if the determination of 'whether an answer exists for the question' is equal to the enableWhen answer (which must be a boolean).

target.display: True if whether an answer exists is equal to the enableWhen answer (which must be a boolean).
